title: Build fails with LLVM 12
body:
*Original issue*: https://gitlab.com/lfortran/lfortran/-/issues/423

Just tested building the latest commit of LFortran (c9b2152f) against [LLVM 12.0.1](https://archlinux.org/packages/extra/x86_64/llvm/) and got the following error:

```
‚ùØ ninja -C _build
ninja: Entering directory `_build'
[28/69] Building CXX object src/lfortran/CMakeFiles/lfortran_lib.dir/codegen/evaluator.cpp.o
FAILED: src/lfortran/CMakeFiles/lfortran_lib.dir/codegen/evaluator.cpp.o 
/usr/bin/c++  -Isrc -I../src -Wall -Wextra -O3 -march=native -funroll-loops -DNDEBUG -fPIC -fno-rtti -std=gnu++17 -Wno-deprecated-declarations -MD -MT src/lfortran/CMakeFiles/lfortran_lib.dir/codegen/evaluator.cpp.o -MF src/lfortran/CMakeFiles/lfortran_lib.dir/codegen/evaluator.cpp.o.d -o src/lfortran/CMakeFiles/lfortran_lib.dir/codegen/evaluator.cpp.o -c ../src/lfortran/codegen/evaluator.cpp
In file included from ../src/lfortran/codegen/evaluator.cpp:44:
../src/lfortran/codegen/KaleidoscopeJIT.h:22:10: fatal error: llvm/ExecutionEngine/Orc/LambdaResolver.h: No such file or directory
   22 | #include "llvm/ExecutionEngine/Orc/LambdaResolver.h"
      |          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
compilation terminated.
[33/69] Building CXX object src/lfortran/CMakeFiles/lfortran_lib.dir/pickle.cpp.o
ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.
```

Tracking this file down in the LLVM repository, it seem that `llvm/ExecutionEngine/Orc/LambdaResolver.h` is a legacy API which was removed in [llvm[@ 6154c41](https://gitlab.com/6154c41)](https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/commit/6154c4115cd4b78d0171892aac21e340e72e32bd#diff-e0594579bffb2f1a2a490cf8831518152b56301407ed7c6724a86f85568deb8c) for LLVM 12.
